DOC.brief_summary: The purpose is to prospectively monitor the performance of the RV Lead Integrity Alert (LIA) upon commercial release.
DOC.brief_title: Enhanced Surveillance of RV Lead Integrity Alert (RVLIA)
DOC.criteria: Lead Integrity Algorithm download; requires a Medtronic device that supports the LIA algorithm; requires an RV lead; selected as part of the identified cohort A device that does not support the Lead Integrity Algorithm,
